text: If you re reading this and you haven t played Mass Effect  why is that  I don t know the details but apparently some of you PlayStation people can t play Mass Effect unless you have a PS  which is understandable  But to those who can buy the games or get them from EA Play Game pass  why have you played the trilogy About   weeks ago I was very bored and I kept looking at game pass EA play to see if anything was interesting  I kept going past Mass Effect and at that point  all I knew was that it was an Xbox   game and it s set in space  that s it Without much interest I tried the first game and holy fuck  it got me hooked Tried the second  first few hours were awful but the game got much better in the last two thirds Played the  rd and finished it yesterday  my favourite game of the trilogy  although last   minutes sucked If you re reading this and you are able to play Mass Effext I m actually begging you to play  The trilogy is amazing and I m so grateful I decided to try it out I know I ve gone past posts saying  Get this game  and not bothered but please at least take a look at them  they re so good Also I heavenly recommend you start at   the gameplay is dated but your missing out if you don t do all   in order
